[ library(ic_kernel) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

set_var_type(?Var, ++Type)

Sets the type of the given variable to the given type.
Var
Variable to set type of
Type
Type to be set 'real' or 'integer'

Description

Typically not called directly but indirectly through reals/1 and integers/1.

See Also

set_vars_type / 2, reals / 1, integers / 1
